page.title: 18POWER STATION STATISTICS
page.content: Elland has for its size and capacity, been the foremost, and most utilised station with 60 megawatt units in the country, and still enjoys a high position in the country's generating league. Since 1959 the station has consumed over 13 million tonnes of coal and produced over 26,000 million kw/hrs of electricity and at present employs 170 people. The ash and dust, which is residue after combustion of the coal, is used in the construction of motorways, environmental landscaping, and for the manufacture of materials for the construction industry.
